programme.desc: Φάση Ομίλων, 2η Αγωνιστική. Η 79η σεζόν του Premier Sports Cup φιλοξενεί 45 ομάδες και ολοκληρώνεται στις 15 Δεκεμβρίου. Οι Ρέιντζερς είναι οι κάτοχοι του τίτλου.

programme.title: Sports Classics: 2023 Outdoor Specials
programme.desc: UIM XCAT World Championships - Fujairah. Το Outdoor Specials σας φέρνει τα πιο συναρπαστικά γεγονότα στον κόσμο των extreme sports. Από το windsurfing μέχρι την ορειβασία και από την οδήγηση αγώνων μέχρι τις καταδύσεις σπηλαίων, αυτή είναι μια σειρά που θα σας δώσει μια γενναιόδωρη δόση αδρεναλίνης.

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
programme.desc: Peter Quill and his fellow Guardians are hired by a powerful alien race, the Sovereign, to protect their precious batteries from invaders. When it is discovered that Rocket has stolen the items they were sent to guard, the Sovereign dispatch their armada to search for vengeance. As the Guardians try to escape, the mystery of Peter's parentage is revealed.

programme.title: The Lazarus Project
programme.desc: After successfully arriving in 2012, George and the Lazarus team face their biggest challenge yet as they attempt to rescue Janet and retrieve the time machine.

programme.title: The Lazarus Project
programme.desc: After successfully arriving in 2012, George and the Lazarus team face their biggest challenge yet as they attempt to rescue Janet and retrieve the time machine.

programme.title: The Day After Tomorrow
programme.desc: After climatologist Jack Hall is largely ignored by U.N. officials when presenting his environmental concerns, his research proves true when a superstorm develops, setting off catastrophic natural disasters throughout the world; trying to get to his son, Sam, who is trapped in New York with his friend Laura and others, Jack and his crew must travel by foot from Philadelphia, braving the elements, to get to Sam before it's too late.

programme.title: I Am Number Four
programme.desc: John Smith (Alex Pettyfer) seems like an ordinary teenager, but he is an alien on the run from merciless enemies hunting him and the eight others like him. Always changing his identity and moving to different towns with his guardian, Henri (Timothy Olyphant), John has no real past and no true home. However, in the small Ohio town where he now lives, he discovers love, powerful new abilities, and a connection to others of his kind.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The NCIS team investigates the murder of Patton's friend, a former Navy SEAL gunned down in a drive-by shooting while Patton watched.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Gideon (Gildart Jackson) conspires with two demons to make Piper, Phoebe and Paige part of "Witch Wars," a new demonic reality television show where demon contestants compete in a series of contests to hunt down the Charmed ones.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Gideon unintentionally creates a portal that sends Chris and Leo to an alternate world where evil rules.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Phoebe and Piper steal the golden chalice in order to bring the fountain of youth to life and save Paige from a curse that an 18th-century pirate gave to her.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Phoebe and Paige attempt to rescue Chris and Leo but find themselves battling their evil counterparts.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Dean, Sam, Castiel and Bobby find Eve in a small town where the citizens have been converted to demons; Eve decides to torture Sam and Dean by bringing their mother back as a demon.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.sub-title: The Man Who Would Be King
programme.desc: Castiel talks about the war in heaven and what happened to set Raphael against him; Bobby suspects Castiel isn't being completely honest.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: When a demon kidnaps Lisa and Ben, Sam and Dean are forced to work with an unlikely ally to save them.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: Charismatic magician Atlas (Jesse Eisenberg) leads a team of talented illusionists called the Four Horsemen. Atlas and his comrades mesmerize audiences with a pair of amazing magic shows that drain the bank accounts of the corrupt and funnel the money to audience members. A federal agent (Mark Ruffalo) and an Interpol detective (Mélanie Laurent) intend to rein in the Horsemen before their next caper, and they turn to Thaddeus (Morgan Freeman), a famous debunker, for help.

programme.title: Now You See Me 2
programme.desc: After fleeing from a stage show, the illusionists (Jesse Eisenberg, Woody Harrelson) known as the Four Horsemen find themselves in more trouble in Macau, China. Devious tech wizard Walter Mabry (Daniel Radcliffe) forces the infamous magicians to steal a powerful chip that can control all of the world's computers. Meanwhile, vengeful FBI agent Dylan Rhodes (Mark Ruffalo) hatches his own plot against Thaddeus Bradley (Morgan Freeman), the man he blames for the death of his father.

programme.title: The Day After Tomorrow
programme.desc: After climatologist Jack Hall is largely ignored by U.N. officials when presenting his environmental concerns, his research proves true when a superstorm develops, setting off catastrophic natural disasters throughout the world; trying to get to his son, Sam, who is trapped in New York with his friend Laura and others, Jack and his crew must travel by foot from Philadelphia, braving the elements, to get to Sam before it's too late.

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: Previously thought to be extinct, a massive creature attacks a deep-sea submersible, leaving it disabled and trapping the crew at the bottom of the Pacific. With time running out, a visionary oceanographer recruits rescue diver Jonas Taylor to save the crew and the sea itself from an unimaginable threat -- a 75-foot-long prehistoric shark known as the Megalodon.

programme.title: Rich & Shameless
programme.sub-title: Saints, Sinners and an NFL Scandal
programme.desc: In the wake of hurricane Katrina, the New Orleans Saints helped bring the city back by shocking the world and winning the Super Bowl, but the team soon faced an even bigger storm, they were accused of paying their players to injure opponents.

programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises
programme.desc: It has been eight years since Batman (Christian Bale), in collusion with Commissioner Gordon (Gary Oldman), vanished into the night. Assuming responsibility for the death of Harvey Dent, Batman sacrificed everything for what he and Gordon hoped would be the greater good. However, the arrival of a cunning cat burglar (Anne Hathaway) and a merciless terrorist named Bane (Tom Hardy) force Batman out of exile and into a battle he may not be able to win.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: Charismatic magician Atlas (Jesse Eisenberg) leads a team of talented illusionists called the Four Horsemen. Atlas and his comrades mesmerize audiences with a pair of amazing magic shows that drain the bank accounts of the corrupt and funnel the money to audience members. A federal agent (Mark Ruffalo) and an Interpol detective (Mélanie Laurent) intend to rein in the Horsemen before their next caper, and they turn to Thaddeus (Morgan Freeman), a famous debunker, for help.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: After Leo and Piper inadvertently receive the powers of Hindu gods, Phoebe and Paige must keep them from consummating their love in order to save the universe.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: When a bored student at the Magic School accidentally conjures up Lady Godiva and Lord Dyson, the Charmed Ones must keep Dyson from killing Lady Godiva before she can go back in time and complete her famous ride.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Grams puts a spell on the brothers to end their rivalry, but the spell turns the Charmed Ones into bickering teens; Leo consults a demonic seer (Charisma Carpenter) to find out who is behind the attack on Wyatt.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: A demon tries to destroy his human half by killing his remaining blood relatives, so Paige casts a spell that inadvertently blocks all death from occurring, angering the Angel of Death (Simon Templeman).

programme.title: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
programme.desc: Having reclaimed Erebor and vast treasure from the dragon Smaug, Thorin Oakenshield (Richard Armitage) sacrifices friendship and honor in seeking the Arkenstone, despite Smaug's fiery wrath and desperate attempts by the Hobbit Bilbo (Martin Freeman) to make him see reason. Meanwhile, Sauron sends legions of Orcs in a sneak attack upon the Lonely Mountain. As the fate of Middle Earth hangs in the balance, the races of Men, Elves and Dwarves must decide whether to unite and prevail -- or all die.

programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: In Steven Spielberg's massive blockbuster, paleontologists Alan Grant (Sam Neill) and Ellie Sattler (Laura Dern) and mathematician Ian Malcolm (Jeff Goldblum) are among a select group chosen to tour an island theme park populated by dinosaurs created from prehistoric DNA. While the park's mastermind, billionaire John Hammond (Richard Attenborough), assures everyone that the facility is safe, they find out otherwise when various ferocious predators break free and go on the hunt.

programme.desc: Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova. Na istom mestu, u isto vreme, kako ih uporediti i kako napraviti večne liste. Neko će probati ono o čemu se decenijama priča...

programme.title: Sport & Tech Lifestyle
programme.desc: Emisija Sport & Tech Lifestyle vodi vas kroz svet najnovijih lifestyle i tehnologija u sportu.

programme.title: Fudbal - Turska liga 2023/2024: Galatasaray - Besiktas
programme.desc: Turska Superliga je najviša profesionalna liga Turske u fudbalu. Ova liga osnovana je 1957. godine.

programme.title: Fudbal - Holandska liga 2023/2024: Feyenoord - Ajax
programme.desc: Očekuje se trka Ajaksa i PSV-a za titulu. Može li Fejenord da im se priključi ili će AZ Alkmar napasti iz senke?

programme.title: Odbojka - Liga nacija (Ž): Serbia - Thailand
programme.desc: Ženska odbojkaška Liga nacija je takmičenje reprezentacija osnovano 2018. godine. 16 reprezentacija bori se za titulu prvaka.

programme.desc: Od 2000. godine najbolje mlade evropske košarkašice takmiče se na Evropskom prvenstvu do 20 godina. Divizija A je najviši stepen U-20 prvenstva u organizaciji FIBA Evrope.

programme.title: Fudbal - Kazahstanska liga: Kairat - Zhenys
programme.desc: Kazahstanska prva fudbalska liga osnovana je 1992. godine, nakon raspada Sovjetskog Saveza, pod pokroviteljstvom Kazahstanskog fudbalskog saveza i predstavlja najviši rang fudbalskog takmičenja u...

programme.title: Rivalitet legendi
programme.desc: Vukli su jedni druge napred, uvek je neki rivalitet izdizao sport na lestvicu više. Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova.

programme.title: Košarka (Ž) U20 EP (Lithuania): Finale: France - Spain
programme.desc: Od 2000. godine najbolje mlade evropske košarkašice takmiče se na Evropskom prvenstvu do 20 godina. Divizija A je najviši stepen U-20 prvenstva u organizaciji FIBA Evrope.

programme.title: Fudbal - Bundesliga: Koln - Bayern
programme.desc: Fudbalska Bundesliga najviši je rang takmičenje u Nemačkoj koja od 1963. godine i svog osnutka visokom kvalitetom igre oduševljava sve fudbalske poklonike širom sveta.
